title: Hyakka Ryouran: Samurai Girls (Samurai Girls)
synopsis: With its gorgeous landscape and prosperous people, Great Japan is the envy of all other nations. But a serious threat hovers over the country.  Mysterious guardians known as Master Samurai are Great Japan's only defense.
